hadiths.text: Anas reported:I saw when the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) got his hair cut by the barber, his Companions came round him and they eagerly wanted that no hair should fall but in the hand of a person

chapter.ara-name: باب قُرْبِ النَّبِيِّ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ مِنَ النَّاسِ وَتَبَرُّكِهِمْ بِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: His Closeness To The People, Their Seeking Blessing From Him And His Humility Towards Them
